parameters.name: AppId
parameters.description: The ID of the application. You can view the application ID on the [Applications](~~2355593~~) page in the ApsaraVideo Real-time Communication (ARTC) section of the ApsaraVideo Live console.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC. The end time must be later than the start time. The time range that can be specified is greater than or equal to 5 minutes and less than or equal to 31 days.

parameters.name: Interval
parameters.description:
The time granularity of the query. Unit: seconds. Valid values:

*   300
*   3600
*   86400

If you specify an invalid value or do not specify this parameter, the default value 3600 is used.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC.
